info.author: Roland Memisevic
info.description:
Monte (python) is a framework for rapidly building learning machines, such as
neural networks, conditional random fields, logistic regression, and others.
Monte consists of almost 100% pure Python code (with a little bit of optional
inline-C for efficiency) and is therefore extremely easy to use and to extend.
info.keywords: machine learning, neural networks, conditional random fields
info.name: Monte
info.summary: Monte - machine learning in pure Python.
info.html_description: Monte (python) is a framework for rapidly building learning machines, such as neural networks, conditional random fields, logistic regression, and others. Monte consists of almost 100% pure Python code (with a little bit of optional inline-C for efficiency) and is therefore extremely easy to use and to extend.
